summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6690 for the improvement of East Valley Street from 33rd Avenue East to 36th Avenue East; and certain other streets, avenues and alleys; by constructing underground utilities lines and a residential street lighting system; under Ordinance 106608, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll establishing a local Improvement Fund, and amending Ordinance 106608, Section 4, removing the interest on the Local Improvement Bonds.
